td.div:
Online resources reminder:
Our students have several online resources that they can use from home. These resources are used throughout the school day and your child should know their log on information.
​
K-8 can use MobyMax.com for all subjects
K-3 can use Razkids.com for reading practice
Grds 3-8 can use Study Island for all subjects and their individualized learning paths.
Grds 3-8 can use IXL.com for math practice
Middle school students can also work on Khan Academy for extra math support.

div.span: Check your child's grades easily by clicking the PowerSchool logo above.

span.span:
It will take you directly to George Crockett Academy's PowerSchool Portal, where you can create an account with access to grades, teacher's notes and other information. Need help navigating the site?
​ Click here for help.

div.div: George Crockett Academy received North Central Association accreditation from AdvanceED on February 2, 2011.

br.span: George Crockett Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.

span.span:
Thomas Goodley, School Leader
